description: Replaces an IAM instance profile for the specified running instance.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1098.003 - Account Manipulation: Additional Cloud Roles

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By changing the IAM instance profile, an attacker can elevate the privileges of the EC2 instance, allowing it to perform actions that require higher permissions. This abuse of the role mechanism can be used to execute privileged commands.

By altering the IAM instance profile, an attacker can modify the authentication process. This change could allow the instance to authenticate as a different role with different permissions, potentially bypassing security controls.

An attacker might replace an IAM instance profile to remove certain access controls or permissions temporarily to perform specific actions without triggering alerts or restrictions. Additionally they might remove the instances from the contol of certain accounts to maybe evade detection. AN example would be to remove access from known cloud security tools.

incidents.description: LUCR-3: SCATTERED SPIDER GETTING SAAS-Y IN THE CLOUD

securityImplications: Attackers might use ReplaceIamInstanceProfileAssociation to replace the IAM instance profile on an instance they control with one that has higher privileges.
